_header: Go little bill and do me recommend
Note: In one MS only of Lydgate’s Troy Book.
Title(s): An Envoy addressed to Our Lady
_description: An Envoy addressed to Our Lady — six stanzas rhyme royal

BodDou326.First Lines:
Go lytyll byll & doe me recommendeVn to my lady with godely
                    countynaunce…
BodDou326.Last Lines:
…sshall be to doe hur obeysaunceAnd hur to loue saunce
                    varyaunce
